translated: The Paṭṭhāna Treatise🔽(The Paṭṭhāna Treatise, in the form of a table of contents, with the three-line headings and the two-line headings.)

analyzed: dhamma anuloma paccanīya tika duka paṭṭhāna pāḷi  kusala ttika
translated: The Triad of the Wholesome, the Dyad of Associated with Mind🔽With a wholesome citta associated with mind as condition there is an unwholesome citta not associated with mind.

original: Kusalaṁ cittasampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo nacittasampayutto dhammo uppajjati🔽hetupaccayā. Kusalaṁ cittasampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naakusalo nacittasampayutto
analyzed: kusalam citta sampayuttam dhammam paṭicca na kusalaḥ na citta sampayuttaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati  hetu paccayā kusalam citta sampayuttam dhammam paṭicca na akusalaḥ na citta sampayuttaḥ
translated: With a wholesome citta associated with mind as condition there is a neutral citta not associated with mind.🔽With a wholesome citta associated with mind as condition there is a wholesome citta not associated with mind.

original: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Kusalaṁ cittasampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naabyākato🔽nacittasampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Kusalaṁ cittasampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ
analyzed: dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā kusalam citta sampayuttam dhammam paṭicca na abyākataḥ  na citta sampayuttaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā kusalam citta sampayuttam dhamma
translated: With a wholesome citta associated with mind as condition there is an unwholesome citta not associated with mind and a neutral citta not associated with mind.

original: paṭicca naakusalo nacittasampayutto ca naabyākato nacittasampayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti🔽hetupaccayā. Kusalaṁ cittasampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo nacittasampayutto
analyzed: paṭicca na akusalaḥ na citta sampayutto ca na abyākato na citta sampayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti  hetu paccayā kusalam citta sampayuttam dhammam paṭicca na kusalaḥ na citta sampayuttaḥ
translated: With a wholesome citta associated with mind as condition there is a wholesome citta not associated with mind and an unwholesome citta not associated with mind.

original: ca naakusalo nacittasampayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā … pañca.
analyzed: ca na akusalaḥ na citta sampayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā pañca
translated: With a wholesome citta associated with mind as condition there is a wholesome citta not associated with mind and an unwholesome citta not associated with mind and a neutral citta not associated with mind.

original: Akusalaṁ cittasampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naakusalo nacittasampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … pañca.
analyzed: akusalam citta sampayuttam dhammam paṭicca na akusalaḥ na citta sampayuttaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā pañca
translated: With an unwholesome consciousness as condition, there arises an unwholesome phenomenon that is not related to consciousness. … (five times, as above.)

original: Abyākataṁ cittasampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo nacittasampayutto dhammo uppajjati🔽hetupaccayā. Abyākataṁ cittasampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naakusalo nacittasampayutto
analyzed: abyākatam citta sampayuttam dhammam paṭicca na kusalaḥ na citta sampayuttaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati  hetu paccayā abyākatam citta sampayuttam dhammam paṭicca na akusalaḥ na citta sampayuttaḥ
translated: With a neutral consciousness as condition, there arises a wholesome phenomenon that is not related to consciousness. …🔽With a neutral consciousness as condition, there arises an unwholesome phenomenon that is not related to consciousness. …

original: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Abyākataṁ cittasampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo
analyzed: dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā abyākatam citta sampayuttam dhammam paṭicca na kusalaḥ
translated: With a neutral consciousness as condition, there arises a wholesome phenomenon that is not related to consciousness and an unwholesome phenomenon that is not related to consciousness. …

original: nacittasampayutto ca naakusalo nacittasampayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā🔽… tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)🔽Hetuyā terasa, ārammaṇe nava …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate terasa.
analyzed: na citta sampayutto ca na akusalaḥ na citta sampayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā  tīṇi  hetuyā terasa ārammaṇe nava pe vipāke tīṇi pe avigate terasa
translated: (The rest is as in the section on the unwholesome, but with the words “unwholesome phenomenon” and “unwholesome phenomena” replaced by “neutral phenomenon” and “neutral phenomena.”)🔽In the section on root cause, there are thirteen. In the section on object, there are nine. … In the section on result, there are three. … In the section on the unspecific, there are thirteen.

original: Cittavippayutte tīṇi, hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: citta vippayutte tīṇi hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi
translated: In the section on not related to consciousness, there are three. In the section on root cause, there are three. … In the section on the unspecific, there are three.
